name: Brute Force
description: mark target without obtaining normal permissions

name: Crack File
description: remove the protection from a file

name: Crash Program
description: force targets program to crash

name: Data Spike
description: send harmful instructions to target causing Matrix damage

name: Denial of Service
description: pollute data streams with noise

name: Erase Marks
description: remove mark on your persona or on another icon

name: Haywire
description: disables all of the target's PAN-related functions

name: Jam Signals
description: turn wireless device you are using into a local jammer

name: Popup
description: target wireless-enabled AR is flooded with Matrix spam

name: Squelch
description: prevents device from calling or sending messages

name: Break Target Lock
description: break lock a target has on you

name: Calibration
description: lend processing power to increase speed of a persona

name: Change Icon
description: change Icon to one you have designed or have a copy of

name: Confuse Pilot
description: send a stream of misleading code to a device with a pilot

name: Control Device
description: perform an action through a device you control

name: Detect Target Lock
description: detect wirless signals for a target lock

name: Enter/Exit Host
description: enter or exit a host

name: Edit File
description: create, change, copy, delete, or protect any kind of file

name: Grid Hop
description: hop to another grid

name: I am the Firewall
description: threat highlighting

name: Intervene
description: give your allies warning to avoid harm

name: Invite Mark
description: offer other icons a mark on your device

name: Jump into Rigged Device
description: jump into a device that has a rigger adaptation

name: Matrix Perception
description: analyze a Matrix object or scan your vicinity

name: Matrix Search
description: search the Matrix for information about a topic

name: Reboot Device
description: device shuts down and immediately reboots

name: Send Message
description: send text or audio message (short sentence), image, or a file

name: Suppress Noise
description: use RCC to reduce noise between user and vehicles/drones

name: Switch Interface Mode
description: switch your perception between AR and VR

name: Tag
description: Visibly Tag a target on a PAN with AROs

name: Target Device
description: target a wireless device spotted on the Matrix

name: Trace Icon
description: find the physical location of a device or persona in the Matrix

name: Trackback
description: track marks back to owners

name: Disarm Databomb
description: disarm a databomb

name: Full Matrix Defense
description: focus on defending yourelf in the Matrix

name: Jackout
description: jack out of the matrix and reboot device being used

name: Check Overwatch Score
description: find how close the grid is to coverging on you

name: Control Device
description: perform an action through a device you control

name: Format Device
description: device is foratted on next reboot

name: Garbage In/Out
description: confuse devices input and output commands

name: Hack on the Fly
description: mark target without obtaining normal permissions

name: Hide
description: Hide in the Matrix

name: Masquerade
description: Impersonate a persona on the Matrix

name: Set Data Bomb
description: set a Data Bomb

name: Snoop
description: intercept Matrix traffic sent to and from target

name: Spoof Command
description: a command that the device thinks is a legitimate one from its owner

name: Subvert Infrastructure
description: Manipulate simple device slaved to host

name: Watchdog
description: User is aware of Matrix actions the target is going to use
